arcade.patch.env.component

Class PatchComponentSitesPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSites
      • arcade.patch.env.component.PatchComponentSitesPattern
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchComponentSitesPatternRect, PatchComponentSitesPatternTri

    public abstract class PatchComponentSitesPattern
extends PatchComponentSites
    Extension of PatchComponentSites for pattern sites.

    A repeating pattern of lattice indices are assigned as sites, defined by tessellating the "unit cell" of the pattern across the entire lattice.

    The amount of concentration added to each index is the difference between the concentration at the index and the source concentration of the molecule. Three hemodynamic factors can be optionally included (RELATIVE_FRACTION) with variable weights to reduce the amount of concentration added.

    • WEIGHT_FLOW = consumption upstream of a given site
    • WEIGHT_LOCAL = local cell consumption of the molecule at a given lattice site
    • WEIGHT_GRADIENT = concentration difference between source and a given lattice site

    Sites can be damaged by setting the DAMAGE_SCALING parameter, which also reduces the amount of concentration added at each index.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatchComponentSitesPattern

        public PatchComponentSitesPattern(Series series,
                                  MiniBox parameters)
        Creates a PatchComponentSites using pattern sites.

        Loaded parameters include:

        • RELATIVE_FRACTION = relative contribution of hemodynamic factors
        • WEIGHT_GRADIENT = weight of gradient hemodynamic factor
        • WEIGHT_LOCAL = weight of local hemodynamic factor
        • WEIGHT_FLOW = weight of flow hemodynamic factor
        • DAMAGE_SCALING = pattern site damage scaling
        Parameters:
        series - the simulation series
        parameters - the component parameters dictionary

      • initializePatternArray

        abstract void initializePatternArray()
        Initializes sites in pattern array.

        Sites are defined by copying the pattern unit cell across the array. Values of 1 and 2 indicate which the two lattice indices that border a capillary.

        public void step(sim.engine.SimState simstate)
